caseTitle: Amir Sultan v. Adjudicating Authority-III EOBI, Islamabad and another
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: To avail the exception under Section 22(2) of the The EOB Act, 1976, the insured person must satisfy that he was in employment in the industry or establishment on the first day of July 1976 or on the day the Act became applicable to such an industry or establishment and was of the age mentioned in Section 22(2)(i) and (ii) of the Act.
